PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xD02090 ^xFFFF77Level 1-3^7 ^x7070FFFreezing Pulse^7^7 + Momentum
^xFFFF77Level 4-28^7 1) ^x3F6DB3^x8888FF^x3F6DB3^x7070FFPurifying Flame^7^7^7^7 (replace with ^x7070FFWave of Conviction^xC8C8C8 at Level 16)^7 +^x7070FFArcane Surge Support^7 +^x7070FFCombustion Support^7 (swap with ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7 at level 18)
2)^x7070FF ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 + ^x8888FF^x7070FFSummon Phantasm Support^7^7 + ^x7070FFCombustion Support^7 (swap with ^x7070FFFaster Casting ^xC8C8C8at level 18)^7 + ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7
3) ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7 + ^x7070FFEfficacy ^7 + ^x7070FFElemental Focus^7
^xFFFF77Level 16^7 ^xE05030Herald of Purirty Herald of Ash^7
^xFFFF77Level 24^7 ^x7070FFFlammability^7
^xFFFF77Level 28 - Fixture of Fate - Buy these gems to level^7 ^x70FF70Explosive Arrow^7^7 ^xE05030Ballista Totem Support^7 2x ^x70FF70Faster Attacks Support^7 (you can start levelling this from level 8 if you want to buy earlier) ^x70FF70Grace^7 ^xE05030Determination^7 ^xE05030Defiance Banner^7 ^x7070FFLightning Spire Trap^7 ^x70FF70Frenzy^7 ^x70FF70Precision (from Vendor)^7
^xFFFF77******** LEVEL 38 TRANSITION POINT **********^7
Buy a ^xAF6025Storm Cloud^7^7 and a ^xAF6025Skirmish^7
^xFFFF77Level 38^7 ^x70FF70^xC8C8C8^xC8C8C81)^7 ^x70FF70Explosive Arrow^7^7^7^7 +^xE05030Ballista Support^7 +^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 +^xE05030^x7070FFIgnite Proliferation^7
2) ^x70FF70Frenzy^7^7 +^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 +^x7070FFHextouch Support^7 +^x7070FFFlammability^7
3) ^x7070FFLightning Spire Trap^7 +^x7070FFCombustion^7
4) ^x7070FFPurity of Elements^7, ^x70FF70Precision^7
5) ^x7070FFLightning Golem^7
^x7070FF^xFFFF77Later^7 ^xE05030Determination^7 + ^x70FF70Grace^7 + ^xE05030Defiance Banner^7 when you need it.
^xFFFF77******** OTHER **********^7^7
^xFFFF77Ascendancy Order^7:
1) Shaper of Flames 2) Mastermind of Discord 3) Heart of Destruction 4) Bastion of Elements (can swap to Shaper of Storms in late game when Atlas is complete and you feel tanky enough)
^xFFFF77Good Leveling Uniques^7 (3.20 prices):
- ^xAF6025Storm Cloud^7 - 3c - ^xAF6025Skirmish ^7- 1c - ^xAF6025Ondar's Clasp^7 - 1c - ^xAF6025Tabula Rasa^7 - 10c - ^xAF6025Goldrim^7 - 2c - ^xAF6025Quill Rain^7 - 7c - ^xAF6025Carnage Heart^7 - 2c - ^xAF6025Le Heup of All^7 - 3c
^xFFFF77Stay updated:^7 Forum Guide / Discussion: https://www.pathofexile.com/forum/view-thread/3229979 Subscribe to my YouTube for updates: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0UHiZPF7vB6N6o4eGs8mPA Follow me on Twitch to watch me play through: https://www.twitch.tv/brunowa_
Have fun!

Items.Item: Rarity: RARE Pain Thunder Thicket Bow Unique ID: 7ae7b816dc464a803c00f2abfc5d4b67255a1c28ef513f8ec520d8204382bb04 Item Level: 87 Quality: 20 Sockets: G-G-R-R-R-R LevelReq: 56 Implicits: 3 {crafted}Quality does not increase Physical Damage {crafted}1% increased Attack Speed per 8% Quality +11 to Dexterity +1 to Level of Socketed Gems +2 to Level of Socketed Bow Gems 17% increased Attack Speed {crafted}Can have up to 3 Crafted Modifiers {crafted}+20% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier {crafted}Gain 16% of Fire Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

Rarity: RARE Blight Dome Blizzard Crown Evasion: 280 EvasionBasePercentile: 0 Energy Shield: 60 EnergyShieldBasePercentile: 0.0192 Unique ID: a70a84e60629672baf9a7479d6abb349dabe2aaed9135ebbfe747189a8659105 Warlord Item Redeemer Item Item Level: 86 Quality: 20 Sockets: R-R-R-B LevelReq: 75 Implicits: 3 {crafted}Explosive Arrow has 15% increased Attack Speed Adds 80 to 122 Cold Damage Your Hits treat Cold Resistance as 10% higher than actual value 11% increased Global Accuracy Rating +7 to Evasion Rating 26% increased Evasion and Energy Shield +3 to maximum Energy Shield +19 to maximum Life 12% chance to Ignite 5% increased Light Radius Ignites you inflict deal Damage 14% faster Nearby Enemies have -12% to Fire Resistance {crafted}+70 to maximum Life
